description: Pocketdev MVP - Complete automation setup with Ralph Loop for continuous development until golden test passes CI

userStories.title: Initialize React Native chat UI application
userStories.description: As a user, I need a React Native mobile app with chat interface so I can interact with the AI terminal.
acceptanceCriteria: React Native project initialized in feat/react-native-chat-ui branch
Chat UI components created with message display and input
WebSocket client integration for real-time communication

userStories.title: Setup Node.js backend with WebSocket and PTY
userStories.description: As a system, I need a Node.js backend with WebSocket support and PTY integration so terminal commands can be executed remotely.
acceptanceCriteria: Node.js project initialized in feat/nodejs-websocket-backend branch
PTY integration for terminal command execution

userStories.title: Create OpenCode agent adapter
userStories.description: As a developer, I need an OpenCode integration adapter so the AI can interact with the development environment.
acceptanceCriteria: OpenCode adapter created in feat/opencode-agent-adapter branch

userStories.title: Setup Detox golden test automation
userStories.description: As a QA engineer, I need Detox E2E tests so I can verify the mobile app functionality automatically.
acceptanceCriteria: E2E test cases for chat functionality
Screenshot and video capture on failure

userStories.title: Configure CI/CD pipeline integration
userStories.description: As a DevOps engineer, I need the complete CI/CD pipeline so all components build and test together.
acceptanceCriteria: GitHub Actions workflow builds all components
Detox E2E tests execute and pass
All checks pass on main branch
userStories.notes: Golden test should output 'Hello, ubuntu!' to indicate success

userStories.title: Verify golden test passes in CI
userStories.description: As the system, I need to verify the golden test passes CI so the MVP is considered complete.
acceptanceCriteria: GitHub Actions build shows green status
Golden test job succeeds on main branch
Ralph Loop auto-detects success and stops
userStories.notes: This is the final verification story - when this passes, Ralph should stop with COMPLETE signal
